message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm starting the negotiations at $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price given the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the market, this product has unique value that I'm confident justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000. This feels like a fair compromise.

Alice, I understand that you believe the product has unique value, but I'm not willing to go above $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. I'll offer $825,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
